PKGMAN-LIST-ORPHANS(1) General Commands Manual PKGMAN-LIST-ORPHANS(1)

NAME

pkgman-list-orphans — list orphaned packages on your system

SYNOPSIS

pkgman list-orphans [-v]

DESCRIPTION

Print list of orphaned packages on your system. “Orphaned” are packages what are not present in the packages sources directories configured in /etc/pkgman.conf as “pkgsrcdir” argument.

The options are as follows:

-v
Also show the ones that depends on orphaned (or even completely missing) packages.
September 9, 2023 Zeppe-Lin
